short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your Campus, Your Connection, All in One Place!.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simplify your life at the University of Sydney with this comprehensive Chrome extension! Stay organized, informed, and productive with features designed specifically for USYD students.

üìÖ Calendar: Access your USYD timetable in an intuitive calendar view. Subscribe to the USYD academic calendar for automatic updates.
üèõÔ∏è University:
Events: Keep track of all USYD events, discover hosting clubs, and check locations and times easily.
Library: View the operational status of all USYD libraries and their facilities. Check occupancy rates for Fisher and Law Libraries in real time to plan your study sessions.
Food: Explore food options on campus, filter by location, view operating hours, and access menus with prices for select locations.
‚è≥ Productivity Tools:
Pomodoro Timer: A customizable focus timer (default 25 minutes) to stay productive while studying or working.
To-Do List: Organize and prioritize your tasks to stay focused on your goals.
Privacy First: This extension does not store your data. You‚Äôre directly connected to USYD systems for accurate, real-time information.

What‚Äôs Next?

-University-wide event integration beyond USU.
-Advanced calendar features with Google/Apple calendar subscriptions.
-Event creation and addition.
-Expanded food menus and details for all campus locations.
-This is a open source project, you can also contribute at [https://github.com/5rijan/Usync-extension] thank you :)

Download today and make the most of your time at USYD!
